"The Friend List":
"About the Friend List

This is where you can check whether players you have added as friends are currently online. You can also send them mail and move to their room.

- Sending Friend Requests
Use the Nearby Characters command to select the name of the player you would like to add as a friend, then select Send Friend Request.

- Responding to Friend Requests
You can use the Friend List to accept or refuse friend requests from other players."

"Unfriending Players

On the Friend List, select the name of the player you want to unfriend, then select Remove Friend.

The players you remove from your Friend List will not be notified and you will still remain on their Friend List.

You can become friends again with players you have previously unfriended."

"The Blacklist

Use the Nearby Characters command to select the name of the player you would like to blacklist, then select Add to Blacklist. You can also remove a player from your Blacklist by selecting Remove from Blacklist.

Party invitations and friend requests from players you blacklist will be automatically blocked.
